Leitmotif [i](If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. When you next cast a spell that shares a color with this card, you may cast this from exile without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“We were never meant to be stuck here, underneath the light of dying stars.”[/i]
